title: The JavaScript 30
description: The popular 30 day web course, along with my own takes on it

title: NodeNotes
description: A note taking app...for your browser! Now you can take notes and browse without switching programs! (Whether or not that's useful is another issue entirely.)

title: Psychic Game
description:
Guess a randomly generated letter.
Your odds may seem low, but you are psychic - right?

title: Boom or Bust
description:
It's kinda like Blackjack, but EXTREME!
A different game every time you play - can you handle it?

title: ScoreKeeper
description: An app to keep scores for board games. Never let someone's bad math skills cheat others out of victory again!

title: GIFLand
description:
All the GIFs you could ever hope for and then some! None of the hard-G vs. soft-G debate!
(NOTE: Peanut Butter not included)

title: Train Scheduler
description:
When is the next train going to arrive? You decide!
(SPOILER ALERT: It's gonna be late)

title: Tippa
description: An app to calculate how much to tip - as well as how to split the tip amongst friends.

title: JavaSnake
description: The classic Nokia phone game - made in JavaScript!

title: Liri
description: A Siri-esque app that runs in your computer's terminal window. As such, there's actually no link for it...

title: Bamazon
description: A Node.js version of a popular consumer website. Like Liri, runs in terminal so there's no link for it.
